name: CITY DEFENDER (Andgameplay)
description:
A small town west of someland is under attack by mysterious terrorists!

Joseph is the only civilian in this city who can defend the city and protect his homeland!

Eliminate waves of terrorists attacking the city, drive vehicles through the city to explore the place and find ammunition and supplies and get the maximum score in this open world style game!

Game developed in the free version of Coppercube;

Third-person shooter, drive the vehicles and explore the city;

Game with day and night cycle system;

Controls:

AWSD = move / drive

mouse = move

Space = jump

shift = run

L = flashlight

Left Mouse = shoot

arrows = drive

C = enter/exit a vehicle

Space / V = up/down the helicopter

R = respawn
